topic.title: Revolution is coming
topic.body:
Getting ready for the continued uptick  in aggression between the colonist slaves
 and the tyranny enforcement agencies of the USA and world.

1_1EBRsDJo4qKthFXgCDGnGEXZxdwhGrtLp2.body: it will always be decided by the people . Side with the few vocal minority as that is where change alays happen and the sheep follow whomever gives the orders

Pity the poor, wretched, timid soul, too faint hearted to resist his oppressors. He sings the songs of the damned, 'I cannot resist, I have too much to lose, they might take my property or confiscate my earnings, what would my family do, how would they survive?' He hides behind pretended family responsibility, failing to see that the most glorious legacy that we can bequeath to our posterity is liberty!
Look at Milwaukee  .Things are getting stupid quick .
Ryan Bundy, Binding the Strong man. https://youtu.be/gF2iwd3WewA via @BrandThornton
